CardData.FlavorText: "Our peril will be greatest just ere we reach the river," said Glorfindel; "for my heart warns me that the pursuit is now swift behind us, and other danger may be waiting by the Ford." â€”The Fellowship of the Ring

Localization.Title: Pursuit on the Shore
Localization.Text: Deal 1 damage to a random Character. Repeat for each Enemy (limit 3)
